level.heading: APPLICABILITY (§ 15-3500) Pursuant to D.C. Code §§ 43-527, 43-609, 43-701 et seq., and 43-1452, thishapter creates an expedited review procedure that shall apply to applicationsy entities regulated by the Commission for authority to issue or amend tariffsnd issue stock or evidences of indebtedness that are payable in more than oneear. Source: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 8202 (October 13, 2000).
